DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate whether treatment Estradiol supplementation luteal phase improve IVF outcomes Patients undergoing IVF treatment control ovarian hyperstimulation use GnRH analog receive 4 mg estradiol valerate luteal phase.Patient 's followup include E2 progesterone BHCG 14 day embryo transfer vaginal ultrasound day 21 28 embryo transfer
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Estradiol Supplementation During Luteal Patients Undergoing IVF Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The study include Patients undergoing IVF treatment control ovarian hyperstimulation use daily GnRH analog long protocol , old 18 , .The woman randomise two groups.Both group give vaginal tab natural micronized progesterone ( Uterogestan ) The study group give oral estradiol Valerate 4 mg.Prior treatment , patient sign informed concent . Patients exclude old 40 , systemic illness personal family history thromboembolic event . Follow : Verification pregnancy status hormonal profile carry day fourteen embryo transfer mean serum hCG , P E2 . clinical pregnancy define presence gestational sac ultrasonography day 21 embryo transfer fetal heart evaluate day 28
DOC.criteria: Women treat infertility control ovarian hyperstimulation use daily GnRH agonist Women young 18 old 40 Women systemic disease Women family personal history thromboembolic event
